metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23165 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc before v1.9.12. Heap buffer overflow in pspdf_prepare_outpages(), in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to execute arbitrary code and denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.3
htmldoc-common - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.7-1ubuntu0.3').
